name: Magical Math Smasher
description:
Try to bounce & smash in 3D while solving basic math challenges in order to keep the throwing magic at 100%! Seems easy, until you try. Choose a room to smash and do your best. Ideal for practicing math. Playable on desktop and mobile.

Instructions: 
      1. Don't let the ball fall from the platform.
      2. Eject all objects.
      3. Move the paddle with A-D (touch on mobile).
      4. Boy is moving randomly.
      5. He will fire magic when you press SPACE (touch on mobile).
      6. Solve math challenges. Time reduces score.
      7. Correct results: magic 100% + extra points.
      8. Best smashes: extra points.
